data.name: Robotpencil Presents: Approachable Anatomy
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=8699-OASD-1871">Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


PSD Example Files

The PSD files should be added to your Software Library upon purchase. If they aren't, click here to add them.


About the Video

Topics Covered:

-Gesture
-Basic Anatomy Sense
-Application through poses
-A demonstration on how you can apply it all to one drawing

Comes with all the PSD's attached to the video tutorial.

There will be more in-depth tutorials for each specific piece of information as time passes. Thanks for the support.
data.about_the_game:
Topics Covered:

-Gesture
-Basic Anatomy Sense
-Application through poses
-A demonstration on how you can apply it all to one drawing

Comes with all the PSD's attached to the video tutorial.

There will be more in-depth tutorials for each specific piece of information as time passes. Thanks for the support.
data.short_description: This video does not go into crazy depth about specific anatomy, but more about the general idea around it and why it's important to you as a character designer. Knowing what you should strive to understand and how it applies, and more importantly how you can use it practically.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
